user_query: I need some help finding suitable categories and cities on Facebook Marketplace. I'm looking to buy some apparel and would like to explore options in New York. Also, could you fetch me some unpaid wish products? I want to see the latest deals and offers available.

TaskList.description: Query suitable categories for apparel on Facebook Marketplace.
Query cities available on Facebook Marketplace for apparel listings.
Fetch apparel listings in New York from Facebook Marketplace.
Fetch unpaid wish products showcasing the latest deals and offers.
